meanings.definition: Not appealing to the taste or appetite.
meanings.sent1: The unappetizing food made me lose my appetite.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria served an unappetizing meal today.
meanings.sent3: The unappetizing sandwich looked like it had been sitting out for days.
meanings.sent4: The unappetizing smell coming from the kitchen made me reconsider my dinner plans.
meanings.sent5: The unappetizing appearance of the dish was enough to turn anyone away.

meanings.sent1: The unappetizing color of the walls made the room feel gloomy.
meanings.sent2: The old, unappetizing building was in need of a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The unappetizing outfit she wore to the party was a fashion disaster.
meanings.sent4: The unappetizing movie failed to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The unappetizing sight of the littered park saddened the community.
